organizations.name: The Obsidian Council
organizations.purpose: Ruling body of the Fractured Realms, maintaining order across the seven provinces
organizations.structure: Council of seven elected representatives, one from each province
organizations.symbols: Black obsidian obelisk with seven facets
organizations.history: Founded 200 years ago after the Great Sundering to prevent further realm fractures.

organizations.name: The Veil Walkers
organizations.purpose: Preserving forbidden knowledge and manipulating events from the shadows
organizations.beliefs: True power lies in secrets; knowledge is the ultimate currency
organizations.symbols: A half-closed eye wreathed in mist
organizations.history: Origins unknown. First documented appearance during the Sundering itself.

organizations.name: The Merchant Consortium
organizations.purpose: Controlling trade routes and commerce across all provinces
organizations.structure: Board of Directors with regional trade masters
organizations.beliefs: Prosperity through fair trade benefits all
organizations.symbols: Golden scales balanced on a compass rose
organizations.history: Grew from a small trading post to the dominant economic force over 150 years.
